QuestData.Title: The Human Condition
QuestData.Description: Humans are so utterly detestable.$B$B<Commander Philips grimaces.>$B$BWhile it is true that I am a soldier of Frostwolf, I remain a servant of Sylvanas.$B$BDuring my tour of duty, I do extra work on the side for the Dark Apothecaries of the Undercity.$B$BI have been tasked with collecting human bone chips that are to be used in curing the human condition.$B$BI am authorized to pass that task on to my subordinates.$B$BFind them. Kill them. Return their bone chips to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: You have been tasked with slaying opposing human players in Alterac Valley.$B$BKill a human and return to Commander Louis Philips (who wanders between the front lines and Frostwolf keep) with a Human Bone Chip.$B$BA cure for the human condition is close at hand!
QuestData.CompletionText: Yes, it is true. My brother is a human. Shameful... A stain upon my nearly immaculate record.
QuestData.RewardText: It would be easier if they just accepted their illness and gave in to your healing touch. It would also probably be less fun. Carry on! We'll cure them, one way or another.
